name: Laguna Beach
shortDescription: A picturesque coastal city famous for its art community, beaches, and scenic ocean views.
fullDescription: Laguna Beach is renowned for its stunning coastline, vibrant arts scene, and unique blend of natural beauty and cultural attractions. With pristine beaches, tide pools, and hiking trails, this city offers a relaxed yet sophisticated lifestyle. Visitors and residents enjoy art galleries, annual festivals, and fine dining, making Laguna Beach a sought-after destination in Orange County for both living and vacationing.
heroImageAlt: Scenic coastline and cliffs at Laguna Beach

neighborhoods.name: Aliso Viejo
neighborhoods.description: Planned community known for parks, shopping, and family-friendly living.

neighborhoods.name: Dana Point
neighborhoods.description: Coastal city with a marina, beaches, and whale watching.

neighborhoods.name: Laguna Niguel
neighborhoods.description: Residential community with parks, shopping centers, and golf courses.

neighborhoods.name: San Clemente
neighborhoods.description: Coastal city known for its pier, beaches, and Spanish-style architecture.

highlights.title: Beaches and Tide Pools
highlights.description: Beautiful sandy beaches and tide pools perfect for exploring marine life.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Laguna Beach coastline with tide pools

highlights.title: Art Galleries and Festivals
highlights.description: Vibrant arts scene with numerous galleries and annual events like the Pageant of the Masters.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Art gallery interior in Laguna Beach

highlights.title: Hiking Trails
highlights.description: Scenic trails in the nearby Laguna Coast Wilderness Park offering ocean views and wildlife sightings.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Trail with ocean view in Laguna Coast Wilderness Park

highlights.title: Marine Protected Areas
highlights.description: Designated marine reserves protecting local sea life and habitats.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Underwater marine life near Laguna Beach

faqs.question: What is Laguna Beach famous for?
faqs.answer: Laguna Beach is famous for its stunning coastline, vibrant arts community, beaches, and outdoor recreational activities.

faqs.question: How are the schools in Laguna Beach?
faqs.answer: Laguna Beach Unified School District is highly rated, offering excellent public education from elementary through high school.

faqs.question: What outdoor activities can I enjoy in Laguna Beach?
faqs.answer: You can enjoy beach activities, tide pool exploration, hiking, whale watching, and visiting art festivals.

faqs.question: How is the commute from Laguna Beach?
faqs.answer: Laguna Beach offers convenient access to the 73 and 405 freeways, with typical commutes to nearby Orange County cities and Los Angeles.
